name: node_sgtserver
description: - use the dataDump.sql file and import it via phpmyadmin SQL tab.  copy and paste the SQL into there to recreate the DB - copy the mysql_connect.php.config file to mysql_connect.php and put in the appropriate data for your local server.  probably user: root and password: root - follow the instructions inside data.php (which will also include altering the files in the dataApi directory)
